description: This file defines a mock class 'VideoDeviceMock' for unit testing, which inherits from the 'device::VideoDeviceImpl' class. It includes mock method declarations for various video device functionalities, such as getting/setting modes, framerate, HDR capabilities, and other device-specific features.

classes.name: VideoDeviceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the 'device::VideoDeviceImpl' class for testing purposes, utilizing Google Mock to simulate video device behaviors.

methods.name: getFRFMode
methods.description: Mock method to get the current FRF (Frame Rate Frame) mode from the video device.

methods.name: setFRFMode
methods.description: Mock method to set the FRF mode for the video device.

methods.name: getCurrentDisframerate
methods.description: Mock method to retrieve the current display framerate.

methods.name: setDisplayframerate
methods.description: Mock method to set the display framerate.

methods.name: getHDRCapabilities
methods.description: Mock method to get HDR capabilities of the device.

methods.name: getSettopSupportedResolutions
methods.description: Mock method to retrieve supported resolutions.

methods.name: setDFC
methods.description: Mock method to set digital flicker control settings.

methods.name: getDFC
methods.description: Mock method to get current VideoDFC settings.
